data.message: Could you tell me why Bernie Sanders is never a trending topic on Facebook even after his landslide win against Clinton? Why are you, as a social media is so biased towards Clinton?

replies.message: Never seen Hillary as a trend either, you must be really paranoid if you think fb is altering their algorithms to exclude people like Bernie.

For some reason for the past entire day even when Bernie officially won the Wisconsin Primary, Hillary Clinton was on trend, and I personally focus a lot on Bernie Sanders and Clinton. If they really did customise every individual's Facebook news, hashtags...etc, wouldnt Bernie also be trending as well based on what you've just stated?

I am all for political freedom and the freedom of choice when it comes to political preferences, but mang, not even Bernie gets a trend- thats not exactly the point of having a social platform that encourages open communication.
